name: Squeaky Wheel
description:
You've gotta go to the grocery store, but unfortunately, you're not the only one with that idea. To make things worse, all the carts have squeaky wheels! INCLUDING YOURS! How annoying! 

Make your way through the 4 stores and get what you need, even if you gotta slam some people and their carts outta your way!

Created by Aiden Gowland, Jack Scheibe, and Ian Lindsay for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. All audio, art, code, and models were created from scratch during the 48 hour jam (excluding royalty free samples: grocery store ambient sound, and tile floor texture).

[Mouse to look, WASD to move, Space to slam]
